flawed_nl_solution:
There are 50 / 2 = <<50/2=25>>25 people in economy class.
There are 25 people in business first and business class, so there are 25 - 3 = <<25-3=22>>22 in business class.
Thus, there are 30 - 22 = <<30-22=10>>10 unoccupied seats in business class.
#### 10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
